name: BomberBoy
overview: BomberBoy is a port of Mega Bomberman (itself a port of the PC Engine game Bomberman '94) for the Famicom made by Super Game and released on a multicart in 1997 by an unknown publisher. BomberBoy features the same modes as Mega Bomberman: a story and a battle mode. The first one comprises 24 individual levels divided into 6 distinct worlds. Bomberman has to defeat all enemies on one stage to proceed. In each level, items can be found by blowing specific tiles.
